mng: position, location, place, seat, classifier for people (honorific), classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)

exm.mng: unit (of measure), unit (group of people as a whole), work unit (place of employment, esp. in the PRC prior to economic reform)
everybody, all (guests, colleagues etc), all of you
all around, omni-directional, complete, holistic, comprehensive
to be located at, to be situated at, to lie
to orientate, to position, to categorize (as), to characterize (as), positioning, position, niche
